overview: A mysterious box is sent to earth by a species from higher dimensions who control matter. It reaches earth, while in it's initial civilization time and the box undergoes an epic journey from civilization to civilization, unrevealed . It travels to Antarctica by Captain James Cook but, under mysterious circumstances it is found few hundred years after Captain James Cook expedition by few Indian Marine Archeologists as a Blue Rock Particle. The plot depicts a supernatural ability of the blue rock material and how it affects the life of Vatsav, a paleontologist who's going to die soon.
title: Vara
